name: QED42
description:
QED42 is a full service Digital agency for web and mobile applications. We specialise in Design, Drupal and Frontend Engineering with Agile as our preferred Project management methodology.
 
8 years in industry, we have delivered large projects for Nestle, MGM Resorts, SABMiller, Novartis, Warner Music Group, UBM, IIT Bombay, Stanford University, TISS, HP, FILA etc and have extensive experience with Design thinking, Drupal (CMS) and Modern Frontend Frameworks e.s.p Angular, Vue.js, Polymer. 
Our Services:
UX and Interaction Design
Web Development using the following technologies
Drupal
Frontend Frameworks ( Angular, Vue.js, Polymer )
Mobile Application Development using Ionic

Digital Consultancy -- Aligning latest in Digital with our client's strategy.
MVP Consultancy & Tech leadership in Product engineering
